name: Express In Music
tag_list: music, personalization, branding, advertising, media, songs, marketing, ad, communication
overview:
Personalization of music that can precisely suits your needs in communication.

Express In Music is a platform supported by SPRING Singapore that connects peopleâ€™s needs in delivering their message emotionally through original Music. Be it a couple in love wanting to pen your personal story in a song or a corporate with a branding purpose to touch the hearts of your targeted audience. With a social element to spread recognition for local musicians, we hope to promote these talents from composers to sound engineers to performing artistes - an opportunity to touch the lives of others through their music in a special personalised way.

How it works:

Upload brief, select track and be heard.

For media advertising, branding consultants, gaming, events, wedding and anyone in the industry that needs effective music personalization:

1.) Upload Brief. In a summary, tell our pool of 1,000++ musicians your requirements for the music. (e.g. TV Commercials or the story of your brand etc)

2.) Select Track. Musicians will see it as a contest and submit their music specifically to your requirements. You award the prize money to the deserving winner and get licensing rights for it.

3.) Be Heard. Discover the value through the speed and quality of a mass of musicians composing for you. You will certainly find the right one here.
